name: Plant Storm
description:
This a store management game.

The main objective of the game is to make enough money to pay off the debt to the bank that come with inheriting the store.

The player starts by purchasing cheap seeds and scraping enough money to get by early in the game. Eventually the player can purchase soil and water upgrades which will enable the purchase of more valuable seeds, which will sprout higher value plants to sell.

The player will be racing against the clock to make enough money to pay the bank each pay period, to keep the game progressing until the debt is payed off.
